sentences: This agenda item includes sub-items on the fourth review of the financial mechanism (FCCC/SBI/2009/MISC.10 &Add.1), the GEF s report (FCCC/CP/2009/9) and assessment of the Special Climate Change Fund (SCCF).
It was first addressed by the SBI plenary on 31 May.
Zaheer Fakir (South Africa) and Sandrine de Guio (France) co-chaired a contact group and informal consultations.
On 9 June, the SBI adopted conclusions.
